wybug_title: 联想某设计不当可导致撞库攻击
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-02-10：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-02-11：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-02-21：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-03-03：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-03-13：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-03-27：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 成功率很高呀 详细说明：  
https://passport.lenovo.com/wauthen/login
登陆的时候没有做验证码，也没限制登陆接口的次数导致撞库
POST /wauthen/sublogin HTTP/1.1Host: passport.lenovo.comUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:34.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/34.0Accept: text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,*/*;q=0.8Accept-Language: zh-cn,zh;q=0.8,en-us;q=0.5,en;q=0.3Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflateReferer: https://passport.lenovo.com/wauthen/login?lenovoid.action=uilogin&lenovoid.realm=www.lenovo.com.cn&lenovoid.uinfo=username&lenovoid.ctx=&lenovoid.cb=http://www.lenovo.com.cn&lenovoid.source=browser:www.lenovo.com.cn&intcmp=lenovoID_logCookie: JSESSIONID=9B1E2430F0B00275346AA089A99F70B8; LPSUUID=29ab138b-2420-4d13-88a6-ba2ca3836917; userlanguage=zh_CN; s_cc=true; s_nr=1423319023677; s_sq=lenovochina-prd%3D%2526pid%253D%2525u8054%2525u60F3%2525u901A%2525u884C%2525u8BC1%25253A%2525u767B%2525u5F55%2526pidt%253D1%2526oid%253D%2525u767B%2525u5F55%2526oidt%253D3%2526ot%253DSUBMIT; __utma=164043554.925092479.1423318996.1423318996.1423318996.1; __utmb=164043554.1.10.1423318996; __utmc=164043554; __utmz=164043554.1423318996.1.1.utmcsr=(direct)|utmccn=(direct)|utmcmd=(none); __utmt=1Connection: keep-aliveContent-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencodedContent-Length: 391t=2331900845458895409&idtype=&lang=&lenovoid.realm=www.lenovo.com.cn&lenovoid.ctx=&lenovoid.lang=&lenovoid.uinfo=username&lenovoid.cb=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.lenovo.com.cn&lenovoid.vp=&lenovoid.action=uilogin&logokgoto=&display=&bootReg=&loginname=aasa%40qq.com&passwd=111111&firstpasswd=%E8%AF%B7%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%E6%82%A8%E7%9A%84%E5%AF%86%E7%A0%81&remember_loginname=1&button=%E7%99%BB%E5%BD%95
   漏洞证明：  成功率很高

wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：低 漏洞Rank：5  确认时间：2015-02-11 11:19 厂商回复： 谢谢您对联想安全工作的支持,我们会尽快修复漏洞 最新状态： 暂无
